schema.title: 基线Id
schema.description: 基线的ID，可以通过 [ListBaselines](~~2261507~~) 获取。

schema.title: 项目空间ID
schema.description: 基线所监控的项目空间ID，可从 ListBaselines 获取。

Success.description:
调用是否成功。

- true：调用成功

- false：调用失败

ErrorMessage.example: Baseline deletion failed with nodes dependent on baseline

RequestId.description: 请求的ID。用于定位日志，排查问题。

responseDemo:
[{"type":"json","example":"{
  "Success": true,
  "ErrorCode": "1031203110000",
  "ErrorMessage": "Baseline deletion failed with nodes dependent on baseline",
  "HttpStatusCode": 200,
  "Data": true,
  "RequestId": "0000-ABCD-EF****"
}","errorExample":""},{"type":"xml","example":"<DeleteBaselineResponse>
    <Success>true</Success>
    <ErrorCode>1031203110000</ErrorCode>
    <ErrorMessage>Baseline deletion failed with nodes dependent on baseline</ErrorMessage>
    <HttpStatusCode>200</HttpStatusCode>
    <Data>true</Data>
    <RequestId>0000-ABCD-EF****</RequestId>
</DeleteBaselineResponse>","errorExample":""}]
title: 删除基线配置
summary: 根据基线ID删除基线配置，只有基线上游没有任何节点的情况下才允许删除。可通过调用UpdateBaseline接口修改基线上游节点。
